casebody.data:
The State ex rel. Cowdrey, Appellant, v. Industrial Commission of Ohio, Appellee, et al.

[Cite as State ex rel. Cowdrey v. Indus. Comm. (1998), 84 Ohio St.3d 221.]

(No. 97-478 Submitted October 27, 1998 Decided December 30, 1998.) Stewart Jaffy & Associates Co., L.P.A., Stewart R. Jaffy and Marc J. Jaffy; and Thomas W. Condit, for appellant. Betty D. Montgomery, Attorney General, and William J. McDonald, Assistant Attorney General, for appellee.

The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed consistent with the opinion of the court of appeals.

Moyer, C.J., Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur. Douglas, J., dissents.
